channel.title: Comments on: Episode #114: Life After Trezor

item.title: By: Amy
item.dc:creator: Amy
item.description: This was a terrific interview and I applause you for interviewing a strong, intelligent woman in a field dominated by men...right up until your idiot staff spit out the demeaning, "she's cute" comment. Inappropriate for the 21st century! Boo
item.content:encoded: This was a terrific interview and I applause you for interviewing a strong, intelligent woman in a field dominated by men…right up until your idiot staff spit out the demeaning, “she’s cute” comment. Inappropriate for the 21st century! Boo
